lead_paragraph: This is the first in a five-part series, "Retelling the War," in which veterans discuss how books, movies and other tales of combat shaped their perceptions of themselves and of war.
snippet: After a childhood steeped in tales of battle, a former Marine confronts his shame about his "easy war" in Iraq....

headline.main: Home Fires: Writing and Rewriting Iraq

abstract: After a childhood steeped in tales of battle, a former Marine confronts his shame about his "easy war" in Iraq.
